title: How to get a date in 60 seconds #shorts
description:
Learn how to go from “Hi” to a first date seamlessly in James’ step-by-step guide: https://tnl.life/4662gMd

**🚀** Want to get coached by the TNL team? Book a free consultation call: https://tnl.life/coachinginquiry

🗓️ Check when TNL is coming to your city. Workshop schedule: https://tnl.life/coachingschedule

~ About The Natural Lifestyles ~
The Natural Lifestyles is the leading elite dating company on the planet. We give dating advice to guys for over a decade with phenomenal results. Our live workshops in New York, Barcelona, Melbourne, Sydney, Budapest etc. are highly requested and offer a life changing experience! Only around 80 guys can be taught live each year.

Do you want to step out of your fear and start a new life? Check our website for more info:

transcription: Hello, how are you? Fine, thanks. Good, I just saw you walking by and I thought I'd speak to you because you're very pretty and elegant. Thanks. So, here I am. Sorry I go to work. How much time do we have, do you think? About one minute. One minute? That's going to have to be a fast romance. Alright, I'm James. What's your name? I'm ******. And I like your handshake. Thanks. Alright, tell me one thing about you quickly before you leave. I love being with my friends. Go out sometimes. So, enjoying being young and pretty. Yes. So, I'm James. I'm from Australia. I live here sometimes. I play the flute. I do Kung Fu. I love to travel and read and write and ride a bicycle. Oh. So, now you know some things. So, would you like to go on a date with me? Or a coffee even just to see when we have more time. Maybe. Okay. Alright, well in that case I'll quickly get your telephone number. Is that your bus? Yes. Alright, quickly tell me your number. Okay. Yes, read. Seven. Yes. Zero. Yes. Eight. Zero one. Okay, have a nice day. Bye. Bye. Bye. Bye. Bye. Bye. Bye. Bye. Bye.
